= Validations =

The validations has an important task to do, validate the field values. Rabbit Forms provides a set of common validations to use, and you can create your own validations too.

== Validations List ==

This is a list of Rabbit Forms validations, click at validation name for see details.

|| *Validation* || *Description* ||
|| [ValidationCompare Compare] || This validation operate on fields and make comparatives with then ||
|| [ValidationEmail Email] || This is a simple e-mail pattern validation ||
|| [ValidationLength Length] || This validation check for length restrictions in field value ||
|| [ValidationRegEx RegEx] || This validation check for pattern restrictions in field value ||
|| [ValidationRequired Required] || This validation force user to input data into field ||

Don't found a validation for your needs? [ValidationExtend Implement it]!
